Package Socket

Class Server

java.lang.Object
Socket.Server
public class Server extends Object
This class represents the server which contains all the methods that can be called by the clientHandler (via the Client).
Author:
NicoT

    Description
    static void
    addBoat(ObjectOutputStream os, String cf, String boatName, Double boatLength)
    This method is called whenever a user decides to add a new boat to his list.
    static void
    addEvent(ObjectOutputStream os, Integer eventID, Integer boatID)

    static void
    addPartner(String name, String surname, String address, String cf, String username, String password)
    It has the purpose to insert all the details of the registering user onto the database if all the fields have been properly filled.
    static void
    addPayment(String cf, Integer id_boat, String date, String expiration, Integer id_competition, String description, Double amount, String payment)
    This method is called when a payment is successful and we want it to be added into the paymentHistory database table with the relative details.
    static void
    addPaymentMethod(String cf, String creditcard_id, String expiration, String cv2, String iban)
    This method is called when, during the payment, the user decides to add a new payment method (both with Credit Card and IBAN).
    static void
    checkBoat(ObjectOutputStream os, String CF, String boatName)
    This method is called when a user wants to add a new boat, it checks if a boat with the same name is still into the database and returns a string (OK, KO) whether if it is found or not into the database.
    static void
    checkEvent(ObjectOutputStream os, Integer eventID, Integer boatID, String CF)
    This method is used to check whether if an event is subscriptable or it has been still subscripted with another boat.
    static void
    checkLogin(ObjectOutputStream os, String userName, String passWord)
    This method is called at the system startup, when someone wants to login (via username and password), it checks the Existence of these credentials and returns the object Person containing all the informations about that user.
    static void
    checkNotifications(ObjectOutputStream os, String CF)
    It has the purpose to check if the expiring date of a precise payment is getting closer and, if yes, it will popup a notification whenever that user logs in.
    static void
    checkUserExistence(ObjectOutputStream os, String userName)
    It checks whether if one user is still subscripted when someone wants to register Controller_SignUp and return a byte (1) if the user is still in the database or (0) if not.
    static void
    createEvent(ObjectOutputStream os, String Name, Double Prize, Double Cost, String Date)
    This method is called by the manager in order to add a new competition to the list and, then, allow other users to subscribe to it.
    static void
    deleteEvent(ObjectOutputStream os, Integer eventID)
    This method can be called only by the manager who wants to delete a precise competition.
    static void
    deleteSubscription(ObjectOutputStream os, Integer eventID, Integer boatID)
    This method is used to selet a subscription of a precise boat from a precise competition, it can be done directly by the user logged in.
    static void
    disconnect()
    This method is called whenever we wants to end the connection to the SQL Database.
    static void
    emptyNotifications()
    It empties the Notification database table when a user logs out because it would be updated on the next login.
    static void
    getAllParticipants(ObjectOutputStream os, Integer eventID)
    This method is used on every login to sort out the winner of a competition that is being held the current day, it retrieve all the participants to a single competition and shuffles out a winner.
    static void
    getEvents(ObjectOutputStream os)
    This method is called whenever a manager logs in and is used to display all the running competition onto the manager homepage.
    static void
    getNotifications(ObjectOutputStream os)
    This method is called when a user logs in, it checks if the Notification database table is populated and, if yes, it warns the user.
    static void
    initializeConnection()
    This method is called when we want to establish a connection to the mySQL Database.
    static void
    main(String[] args)
    This method is the main one, which is firstly executed before all the others; it manages the Threads and the informations written onto the console.
    static void
    removeBoat(ObjectOutputStream os, Integer ID, Integer Checker)
    This method is called when a user wants to delete a boat, it checks also if the selected boat is currently subscripted to a competition, and, if yes it shows an alert onto the user screen telling that, if he wants to delete that boat he will also unsubscribe from the subscripted competition.
    static void
    retrieveBoats(ObjectOutputStream os, String CF)
    This method is used to retrieve all the boats owned by the logged user and put them inside the listview.
    static void
    retrievePaymentHistory(ObjectOutputStream os, String CF)
    This method is called when a user wants to check his payment history Controller_History.
    static void
    retrievePaymentMethods(ObjectOutputStream os, String CF)
    This method is called all the times that the user enters the payment page and it loads all the payment methods previously added in order to avoid the manual re-insert of these values.
    static void
    retrievePerson(ObjectOutputStream os, String CF)
    This method is used to retrieve the object Person passing the unique identifier CF.
    static void
    retriveCompetitions(ObjectOutputStream os, String CF)
    This method is used to retrieve all the competitions and associate them to the corresponding boat in case that one is subscripted to any of the available competitions.
    static void
    setPodium(Integer id, String podium)
    This method is used to modify the competition attribute podium to the newly extracted podium.

    • checkLogin

      public static void checkLogin(ObjectOutputStream os, String userName, String passWord) throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException, IOException
      This method is called at the system startup, when someone wants to login (via username and password), it checks the Existence of these credentials and returns the object Person containing all the informations about that user. If the recognized user has Manager instance equals to 1 than a specific page Controller_Manager will be shown.
      Parameters:
      os - Output Stream Output Stream
      userName - written username
      passWord - written password
      Throws:
      SQLException - Handles SQL Errors
      ClassNotFoundException - Handles The Non-Existence of A Class
      IOException - Handles Input-Output Exceptions

    • checkUserExistence

      public static void checkUserExistence(ObjectOutputStream os, String userName) throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException, IOException
      It checks whether if one user is still subscripted when someone wants to register Controller_SignUp and return a byte (1) if the user is still in the database or (0) if not.
      Parameters:
      os - Output Stream
      userName - the written username
      Throws:
      SQLException - Handles SQL Errors
      ClassNotFoundException - Handles The Non-Existence of A Class
      IOException - Handles Input-Output Exceptions

    • addPaymentMethod

      public static void addPaymentMethod(String cf, String creditcard_id, String expiration, String cv2, String iban) throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException, IOException

      creditcard_id - CC Number

    • addPayment

      public static void addPayment(String cf, Integer id_boat, String date, String expiration, Integer id_competition, String description, Double amount, String payment) throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException, IOException
      This method is called when a payment is successful and we want it to be added into the paymentHistory database table with the relative details.
      Parameters:
      cf - passed CF
      id_boat - passed Boat ID
      date - payment execution Date
      expiration - payment Expiration
      id_competition - passed Competition ID
      description - payment description
      amount - payment amount
      payment - payment method
      Throws:
      SQLException - Handles SQL Errors
      ClassNotFoundException - Handles The Non-Existence of A Class
      IOException - Handles Input-Output Exceptions

    • addBoat

      public static void addBoat(ObjectOutputStream os, String cf, String boatName, Double boatLength) throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException, IOException
      This method is called whenever a user decides to add a new boat to his list. The boat addon is executed when the boat storage fee is successfully payed.
      Parameters:
      os - Output Stream
      cf - passed CF
      boatName - new Boat Name
      boatLength - new Boat Length
      Throws:

    • checkBoat

      public static void checkBoat(ObjectOutputStream os, String CF, String boatName) throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException, IOException
      This method is called when a user wants to add a new boat, it checks if a boat with the same name is still into the database and returns a string (OK, KO) whether if it is found or not into the database.
      Parameters:
      os - Output Stream
      CF - owner CF
      boatName - new boat Name
      Throws:
      SQLException - Handles SQL Errors
      ClassNotFoundException - Handles The Non-Existence of A Class
      IOException - Handles Input-Output Exceptions

    • removeBoat

      public static void removeBoat(ObjectOutputStream os, Integer ID, Integer Checker) throws ClassNotFoundException, IOException, SQLException, InterruptedException
      This method is called when a user wants to delete a boat, it checks also if the selected boat is currently subscripted to a competition, and, if yes it shows an alert onto the user screen telling that, if he wants to delete that boat he will also unsubscribe from the subscripted competition.
      Parameters:
      os - Output Stream
      ID - boat ID
      Checker - Controller
      Throws:
      SQLException - Handles SQL Errors
      ClassNotFoundException - Handles The Non-Existence of A Class
      IOException - Handles Input-Output Exceptions
      InterruptedException - Handles Interruption Exception

      CF - unique user identifier CF
      Throws:
